200k_leaderboard.description: The $200,000 Stake Monthly Leaderboard runs every month from the 1st to the last day. Users under code Donde compete for rewards, with a $60,000 top prize. Winners must open a #ticket-help before the 3rd of the next month with proof.

10k_dd_leaderboard.description: The $10,000 Donde Dollar Monthly Leaderboard (on dondebonuses.com) also resets on the 1st of each month. 50 winners share the pool, with a $3,000 top prize. Earn DD by watching Kick streams, completing site tasks, and linking your Stake account.

bonuses.$50_free_stake: New accounts under code Donde get $50 free balance ($28 in reloads, $22 tip). Must open a ticket and send your Stake username.
bonuses.$25_free_stakeus: Stake.us users can sign up using code Donde for a $25 welcome bonus + $1 forever (requires KYC).
bonuses.deposit_bonus: 200% deposit bonus (up to $1500). Must create account under Donde, deposit $100-$1500, and open a ticket to claim.

25k_monthly.description: The $25,000 Stake Monthly Raffle runs each month for users under Donde, with $5,000, $3,000, and $2,000 top prizes.

giveaways.info: Giveaways happen only on Twitter and Discord under Donde’s community. There is no #events channel.

notes.referral: Players must register under Donde’s referral link to qualify for any rewards or bonuses.
notes.contact: For issues regarding payouts, KYC, or account help, open a #ticket-help channel.
notes.misc: Donde is an affiliate partner of Stake. His community rewards users through monthly leaderboards, raffles, and bonuses both on Stake and on dondebonuses.com.
